752630.name: NASCAR Heat 2 - November Jumbo Expansion
752630.description:
With 85 paint schemes in total, the action packed first round of the playoffs is the focus of this expansion! There are 33 paint schemes from the first round of the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series Playoffs and 20 from the first round of the NASCAR XFINITY Series Playoffs, along with 32 others! Also included are 3 new Challenges and spotter guidance courtesy of Brad Keselowski’s own spotter, Joey Meier.

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Jimmie Johnson #48 Lowe's / Hitachi Chevrolet (Chicago)
Kyle Busch #18 Caramel M&M's Toyota (New Hampshire)
Kevin Harvick #4 Mobil 1 Ford (New Hampshire)
Chase Elliott #24 Mountain Dew Chevrolet (Bristol)
…

NXS:
Elliott Sadler #1 Golden Corral Chevrolet (Richmond)
Jeremy Clements #51 RepairableVehicles.com Chevrolet (Road America)
William Byron #9 Axalta / Central Aluminum Chevrolet (Dover)

Plus, many more!

This content is also included in the 2017 Hot Pass!
752630.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
